    Get simple reactable table

    simple_reactable_table.Rd

    Get simple reactable table

    Usage

    simple_reactable_table(data, shiny_vers = F)

    Arguments

    data

    tibble with dataset

    shiny_vers

    option to return shiny version used in `simple_html_table()`

    Value

    reactable object

    Examples

    simple_reactable_table(iris)
